title: pixel 3a with Ghost touching.
content:
One day without reason, my phone start to touch the screen by itself, It does not respond to my touches, open apps, write, turn on flashlight, etc. I tried everything, force reset, drained the battery to 0 , factory reset, but nothing works, the phone is useless, Any solution more than give it back to google to fix it? 
thanks for any help you can give me folks!!
